original: @101b dpal lha mo sgra dbyangs la bstod pa /
analyzed: @101b dpal lha mo sgra dbyangs la bstod pa /
translated: Praise of the Glorious Goddess SarasvatÄ«ðŸ”½By which path do Buddhas arise,

original: lam gang gis na sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang // rgyal ba sras bcas chos kyi bla mar gyur //
analyzed: lam gang gis na sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang // rgyal ba sras bcas chos kyi bla mar gyur //
translated: And the Victorious Ones and their heirs become the supreme teachers of Dharma?

original: mkhyen pa'i rim par sa rnams bkod pa yi //
analyzed: mkhyen pa'i rim par sa rnams bkod pa yi //
translated: The stages of knowledge are arranged in the levels,

original: shes rab dkyil 'khor mang la skyabs su mchi //
analyzed: shes rab dkyil 'khor mang la skyabs su mchi //
translated: And I go for refuge to the many mandalas of wisdom.

original: phyag 'tshal dpal ldan lha mo dbyangs can ma //
analyzed: phyag 'tshal dpal ldan lha mo dbyangs can ma //
translated: I pay homage to the glorious Goddess SarasvatÄ«,

original: 'jig rten khams 'dir smra la dbang brnyes shing //
analyzed: 'jig rten khams 'dir smra la dbang brnyes shing //
translated: Who has gained mastery over speech in this world system,

original: drang srong rig gsum rig pa'i pha rol gshegs //ðŸ”½de ni spyod pa rgya @102a *//
analyzed: drang srong rig gsum rig pa'i pha rol gshegs // de ni spyod pa rgya @102a *//
translated: And has gone to the far shore of the knowledge of the three Vedas.

original: chen rnams las byung //ðŸ”½sems can don phyir 'phrin las chen po'i khur //
analyzed: chen rnams las byung // sems can don phyir 'phrin las chen po'i khur //
translated: That arises from the vast conduct,ðŸ”½And for the sake of sentient beings, you have taken on the great burden of activity,

original: spro bar dka' ba kun kyang khyod kyis mdzad //
analyzed: spro bar dka' ba kun kyang khyod kyis mdzad //
translated: Which is difficult to undertake.

original: sa dang pha rol phyin pa bcu spyad pas //
analyzed: sa dang pha rol phyin pa bcu spyad pas //
translated: By practicing the ten perfections and levels,

original: dge ba'i tshogs brtan yid bzhin las su bsgyur //
analyzed: dge ba'i tshogs brtan yid bzhin las su bsgyur //
translated: You have stabilized the accumulation of virtue and transformed it into a wish-fulfilling activity.

original: zhal gyi dkyil 'khor zla ba dri med rgyas //
analyzed: zhal gyi dkyil 'khor zla ba dri med rgyas //
translated: Your face mandala is as vast as the stainless moon,

original: thugs rje'i spyan gyis 'gro ba'i mig byed pa //
analyzed: thugs rje'i spyan gyis 'gro ba'i mig byed pa //
translated: And with your eyes of compassion, you act as the eyes for beings.

original: dus ring 'jig rten kun la bde bar gzigs //
analyzed: dus ring 'jig rten kun la bde bar gzigs //
translated: For a long time, you have looked upon the world with happiness.

original: de la dbang po tshangs sogs shin tu 'dud //
analyzed: de la dbang po tshangs sogs shin tu 'dud //
translated: Brahma and others are very devoted to you.

original: byams shing bzod ldan snying rje bskyed pa'i ma //
analyzed: byams shing bzod ldan snying rje bskyed pa'i ma //
translated: You are the mother who gives rise to love, patience, and compassion.

original: lha mo mchog de 'gro kun skyong bar dgyes //
analyzed: lha mo mchog de 'gro kun skyong bar dgyes //
translated: That supreme goddess delights in protecting all beings.

original: thor tshugs ri bo rtse 'dra spobs pa 'phags //
analyzed: thor tshugs ri bo rtse 'dra spobs pa 'phags //
translated: Your topknot is like the peak of a mountain, and your eloquence is exalted.

original: shes rab zab cing shes pa'i rten byed kyang //
analyzed: shes rab zab cing shes pa'i rten byed kyang //
translated: Your wisdom is profound, and you serve as the basis for knowledge.

original: rig pa'i gnas la mnga' brnyes tshig gi bdag /
analyzed: rig pa'i gnas la mnga' brnyes tshig gi bdag /
translated: You have mastered the fields of knowledge and are the lord of words.

original: 'jig rten na yang lha yi lhar gyur la //
analyzed: 'jig rten na yang lha yi lhar gyur la //
translated: Even in the world, you are the god of gods.

original: sdug bsngal bsal bar rab brtson gnyen mchog pas //
analyzed: sdug bsngal bsal bar rab brtson gnyen mchog pas //
translated: You are the supreme friend who strives to remove suffering.

original: mu su rtog ge ba rnams kun kyang 'dud //
analyzed: mu su rtog ge ba rnams kun kyang 'dud //
translated: Even all the logicians of Mushi bow to you.

original: yan lag rnam par 'byes shing gsung snyan pa //
analyzed: yan lag rnam par 'byes shing gsung snyan pa //
translated: Your limbs are well-proportioned, and your speech is melodious.

original: yon tan dri med bsod nams 'bar bar bsgyings //
analyzed: yon tan dri med bsod nams 'bar bar bsgyings //
translated: You are resplendent with stainless qualities and blazing merit.

original: rig pa mchog gi dngos grub sbyin mdzad pa //
analyzed: rig pa mchog gi dngos grub sbyin mdzad pa //
translated: You bestow the supreme siddhi of knowledge.

original: blo myur tshig 'chang spobs pa'i mchog stsol cig /
analyzed: blo myur tshig 'chang spobs pa'i mchog stsol cig /
translated: Grant me swift intelligence, eloquent retention, and the highest confidence.

original: sems can kun la rtag tu phan sems pa //
analyzed: sems can kun la rtag tu phan sems pa //
translated: You always have the intention to benefit all beings.

original: mi bslu mchog khyod rnam grol sa la bzhugs //
analyzed: mi bslu mchog khyod rnam grol sa la bzhugs //
translated: You are the supreme, unfailing one, dwelling on the ground of liberation.

original: thugs dam brtan bcas bskul ba rnams la yang //
analyzed: thugs dam brtan bcas bskul ba rnams la yang //
translated: You are the one who is firm in your resolve, and you are the one who is invoked by all.

original: dpal gyis dgongs shig don kun nye bar skongs //
analyzed: dpal gyis dgongs shig don kun nye bar skongs //
translated: You are the one who is glorious, and you are the one who fulfills all purposes.

original: 'di ltar 'jig rten dag na snang ba kun //
analyzed: 'di ltar 'jig rten dag na snang ba kun //
translated: In this way, all that appears in the world

original: sgra 'joms khyad par tshig gis don mtshon te //
analyzed: sgra 'joms khyad par tshig gis don mtshon te //
translated: Is indicated by words that overcome sound and convey meaning.

original: @102b phan tshun shes shing yang dag brda sprod pa'ang //
analyzed: @102b phan tshun shes shing yang dag brda sprod pa'ang //
translated: The mutual understanding and correct communication

original: dbyangs can khyod kyi mthu ste bsam mi khyab //
analyzed: dbyangs can khyod kyi mthu ste bsam mi khyab //
translated: Is the inconceivable power of SarasvatÄ«.

original: gzungs dang chos kyi stobs la dbang brnyes pa /
analyzed: gzungs dang chos kyi stobs la dbang brnyes pa /
translated: You have attained mastery over the power of retention and the Dharma,

original: dam tshig bden grub drang srong shes nyen can //
analyzed: dam tshig bden grub drang srong shes nyen can //
translated: You are a sage who knows the truth of the binding of vows,ðŸ”½You bless the body, speech, and mind,

original: lus sems ngag rnams byin gyis rlob pa dang // yid 'ong sgras kyang 'jig rten tshim par byed //
analyzed: lus sems ngag rnams byin gyis rlob pa dang // yid 'ong sgras kyang 'jig rten tshim par byed //
translated: And you satisfy the world with your pleasing voice.

original: byang chub mchog gi spyod phyir su dag mos //
analyzed: byang chub mchog gi spyod phyir su dag mos //
translated: For the sake of supreme enlightenment, you are the one who is worshipped.

original: bdag dang gzhan don phun sum tshogs 'gyur ba'i //
analyzed: bdag dang gzhan don phun sum tshogs 'gyur ba'i //
translated: For the sake of the perfect benefit of self and other,

original: lus dang ngag yid rnam dag mchog 'dod la //
analyzed: lus dang ngag yid rnam dag mchog 'dod la //
translated: For those who desire the supreme purity of body, speech, and mind,

original: bcom ldan 'das mas rtag tu don mchog stsol //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das mas rtag tu don mchog stsol //
translated: The Blessed Lady always bestows the supreme benefit.

original: bdag ni dpa' zhing byang chub lam brtson dang // lce yi dbang po dag cing tshig btsun la //
analyzed: bdag ni dpa' zhing byang chub lam brtson dang // lce yi dbang po dag cing tshig btsun la //
translated: with a pure tongue faculty, my words are trustworthy,ðŸ”½endowed with a treasure of knowledge, eloquent without impediment,

original: rig pa'i gter ldan smra la thogs med dang // bde gshegs spobs pa nye bar sgrub tu gsol //
analyzed: rig pa'i gter ldan smra la thogs med dang // bde gshegs spobs pa nye bar sgrub tu gsol //
translated: I supplicate the Sugata to grant me eloquence.

original: rig pa'i yum gyi rang bzhin rtog las bden //
analyzed: rig pa'i yum gyi rang bzhin rtog las bden //
translated: The nature of the mother of knowledge is true from the perspective of thought,

original: snyan pa'i rgyal mtshan dga' ba'i shugs kyis bskyod //
analyzed: snyan pa'i rgyal mtshan dga' ba'i shugs kyis bskyod //
translated: the banner of fame is moved by the force of joy,

original: mkha' la sna tshogs rnam par dri 'dod ltar //
analyzed: mkha' la sna tshogs rnam par dri 'dod ltar //
translated: like desiring various scents in the sky,

original: mtshan nyid rtogs dka' yon tan gting mtha' med //
analyzed: mtshan nyid rtogs dka' yon tan gting mtha' med //
translated: the characteristics are difficult to realize, the qualities are boundless.

original: na mo bha ga wa te /
analyzed: na mo bha ga wa te /
translated: Namo Bhagavate

original: brahma ne / na ma: sva ra sva tyee de bi siddhya ntu mantra p'a da tam bra hm'a nu mantra sv'a h'a /
analyzed: brahma ne / na ma: sva ra sva tyee de bi siddhya ntu mantra p'a da tam bra hm'a nu mantra sv'a h'a /
translated: Brahmane, Namah Sarvasatye Devasi Siddhyantu Mantrapada Brahma Namumantrata Svaha.

original: dpal lha mo sgra dbyangs la bstod pa rdzogs so ////
analyzed: dpal lha mo sgra dbyangs la bstod pa rdzogs so ////
translated: The praise of glorious goddess Saraswati is complete.
